notes: Current Status: Photo ID Not Required Voters will not be required to show photo ID for elections held in 2020. Federal and state courts have temporarily blocked North Carolinaâ€™s voter photo ID requirement from taking effect until further order of the courts. Do I need to include a copy of a photo ID with my absentee request form/ballot? No. North Carolina voters are not required to provide or show ID until further order of the courts.
